post.author: Admin
post.title: Market Day Orders are Due Saturday
post.description:
Hi Band Boosters,
Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, November 29, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www
post.content:
Hi Band Boosters,

Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, November 29, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www.marketday.com. Pick up is Thursday, December 4, 2014 from 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm in Cafeteria #2.

If you spend at least $90 this month and enter the promo code DECBONUS during checkout you will receive a free 1 lb. Pork Tenderloin.

Also, this is month you will receive your free Frequent Buyer Salad Bowl Serving Set if you made two purchases of $40 or more between the September, October and/or November sales.

FYI....You can enter multiply promo codes on the same order.

Any questions, please contact Sue Galuska at suegaluska@yahoo.com or 440-582-4120.

Thanks,
Sue Galuska
